column5: These came from two different lakes. The jumbo was 13in. long.

I should have mentioned - I caught several more right around the 10-11in. range which I released. I love eating fish but seldom keep them. I would like there to be some around for my grand kids grand kids to catch. My grand kids release most all their fish and love to see them swim away.

I fish a lot and eat fish two or three times a year. I love me a feed of cold water perch and a northern Ontario fish fry of pike or walleye and thatâ€™s it. I catch and release 90% of what I catch. Love to watch the big ones swim away! Nothing better
Fishing a little slow on Pigeon lake.
